snippet: Richard Oates, who left a restaurant career to run a skateboard shop in Brooklyn, was killed by a truck on which he was hitching an illegal ride with his skateboard.
abstract: New York City police report death of Richard Oates, successful Manhattan chef who changed careers to open East River Skate Shop in Greenpoint, Brooklyn; Oates was killed in Lower Manhattan after illegally hitching ride on skateboard by clinging to side of truck and then falling under its rear wheels.
lead_paragraph: Richard Oates, who left a restaurant career to run a skateboard shop in Brooklyn, was killed by a truck on which he was hitching an illegal ride with his skateboard.

headline.main: A Skateboard Stunt Turns Fatal for a Former Chef
headline.print_headline: A Passion Turns Fatal for a Former Chef

keywords.name: organizations
